groupItems.title: Engine Temperature Warning Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light means the engine temperature has exceeded normal limits. Check coolant level, fan operation, radiator cap, coolant leaks.

groupItems.title: Battery Charge Warning Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the car’s charging system is short of power or is not charging properly. It normally indicates a problem with the battery itself or the alternator.

groupItems.title: Oil Pressure Warning Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light means loss of oil pressure, meaning lubrication is low or lost completely. Immediately check the oil level and pressure.

groupItems.title: Brake Warning Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on when the handbrake is on. If it lit continuously, it means that hydraulic pressure has been lost in one side of the brake system or that the fluid level in the master cylinder is dangerously low (due to a leak somewhere in the brake system).

groupItems.title: Transmission Temperature
groupItems.description: Indicator light means the engine temperature has exceeded normal limits. Check coolant level, fan operation, radiator cap, coolant leaks.

groupItems.title: Tire Pressure Warning Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light means the pressure is low in one of your tires.

groupItems.title: Traction Control Off
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the vehicles TCS (traction control system) has been deactivated.

groupItems.title: Steering Wheel Lock
groupItems.description: Indicator light means your steering wheel is locked and can not be moved. To turn off the steering lock, insert the key into the ignition and turn it to at least the first position while turning the steering wheel in either direction.

groupItems.title: Trailer Tow Hitch Warning
groupItems.description: Indicator lights mean that the tow hitch is unlocked or that there’s an issue with the lighting system.

groupItems.title: Traction Control Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on when the vehicle TCS (traction control system) is activated.

groupItems.title: Service Vehicle Soon
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on when there is a fault condition in an area of the vehicle chassis systems such as—the anti-lock (ABS) brake system, the traction control (TCS) system, the electronic suspension system, or the brake hydraulic system.

groupItems.title: Security Alert
groupItems.description: Indicator light will turn on momentarily if the ignition switch is locked and will need the proper transponder-equipped key to restart. If the light is visible when the vehicle is on, then it typically indicates a malfunction in the security system.

groupItems.title: Side Airbag
groupItems.description: Indicator light means a fault with the side airbag.

groupItems.title: Reduced Power Warning
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the Engine Computer has limited engine power output.

groupItems.title: Seat Belt Indicator
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that a seat belt has not been secured for a passenger in the vehicle.

groupItems.title: Press Clutch Pedal
groupItems.description: Indicator to push the clutch.

groupItems.title: Powertrain Fault
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on when a powertrain or AWD fault has been detected. Contact your mechanic as soon as possible.

groupItems.title: Power Steering Warning Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on if there is an issue with the power steering system, and will be disabled until fixed.

groupItems.title: Press Brake Pedal
groupItems.description: Indicator to push the brake pedal.

groupItems.title: Parking Brake Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light means park brake is on.

groupItems.title: Overdrive Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the vehicle’s overdrive system has been manually turned off.

groupItems.title: Oil Change Reminder
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that oil life has expired.

groupItems.title: Master Warning Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light usually accompanied by another warning light and indicates that one or more warning systems have been detected.

groupItems.title: Information Warning Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light will turn on when a new message is stored in the information display. It will be red or amber in color depending on the severity of the message and will remain on until the cause of the message has been rectified.

groupItems.title: Icy Road Warning Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on when the outside air starts to reach freezing temperatures, around 35°F or 3°C.

groupItems.title: Gas/Fuel Cap
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on if the gas/fuel cap is not properly tightened.

groupItems.title: ESP Fault/Traction Control Malfunction
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that there is a problem with the vehicle’s traction control.

groupItems.title: Electric Park Brake
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on when the electric parking brake has a malfunction.

groupItems.title: Distance Warning
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that a vehicle in front is too close or is being approached too quickly, or that a stationary obstacle exists in the direction of travel.

groupItems.title: Clogged Air Filter
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on when there is reduced airflow to the engine. Have the air filter replaced or inspected.

groupItems.title: Child Safety Lock
groupItems.description: Indicator light means child safety lock is active.

groupItems.title: Check Engine or Malfunction Indicator Light (MIL)
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on whenever the engine is turned on to check the bulb. If the light stays illuminated, the car’s diagnostic systems have detected a malfunction that needs to be investigated.

groupItems.title: Catalytic Converter Warning
groupItems.description: Indicator light means the catalytic converter is either overheating or not operating as intended.

groupItems.title: Brake Fluid
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the brake fluid level is low.

groupItems.title: Brake Pad Warning
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the brake pads are worn.

groupItems.title: Brake Lights Warning
groupItems.description: Indicator light means an exterior brake light bulb is defective. Check the operation of all the exterior brake light bulbs.

groupItems.title: Automatic Gearbox Warning
groupItems.description: Indicator light means there’s a gearbox/transmission malfunction.

groupItems.title: Anti-lock Braking System (ABS)
groupItems.description: Indicator light means there may be a malfunction in the ABS system.

groupItems.title: All Wheel Drive (AWD/4WD)
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on when there is a malfunction with the 4WD system.

groupItems.title: Airbag Indicator
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on when the front airbag is switched off. If this lamp lights up or flashes there is a fault in the airbag or seatbelt system.

groupItems.title: Airbag Deactivated
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on when there is a fault in the rear spoiler system.

groupItems.title: Adaptive Suspension Dampers
groupItems.description: Indicator light means there is a need to contact an authorised repairer.

groupItems.title: 4 Wheel Drive (4WD) LOCK Indicator Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the vehicle’s 4WD Lock mode is activated.

groupItems.title: Air Suspension
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that there is a problem with the air suspension bags, likely due to a leak or inflation issue.

groupItems.title: Low Beam Indicator Light
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the vehicles dipped beam is on.

groupItems.title: Lamp Out
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that there is an exterior light on the vehicle that is not functioning properly.

groupItems.title: High Beam Light Indicator
groupItems.description: Indicator light means your car’s high beam headlights are on, or if the high beam flash function is used.

groupItems.title: Headlight Range Control
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on if there is an issue detected with the headlight range control system.

groupItems.title: Front Fog Lights
groupItems.description: Indicator light means front fog lights are turned on.

groupItems.title: Exterior Light Fault
groupItems.description: Indicator light means any exterior light on your car isn’t working.

groupItems.title: Auto High Beam
groupItems.description: Indicator light means the Auto High Beam system has switched on high beam headlights.

groupItems.title: Adaptive Light System
groupItems.description: Indicator light will lit when adaptive headlights are turned on.

groupItems.title: Side Light Indicator
groupItems.description: Indicator light will turn on when the normal headlights are in use.

groupItems.title: Rear Fog Lights Switched On
groupItems.description: Indicator light means rear fog lights are on.

groupItems.title: Rain and Light Sensor
groupItems.description: Indicator light means there is an issue with the sensor system. The wipers and lights will not function automatically.

groupItems.title: Windshield Defrost
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the window defrost is in operation.

groupItems.title: Washer Fluid Reminder
groupItems.description: Indicator light indicates if the windscreen washer fluid reservoir is nearly empty. Fill the washer fluid reservoir.

groupItems.title: Rear Window Defrost
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the rear window defrost is in operation.

groupItems.title: Low Fuel Level
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the car is running low on fuel and will soon need a refill.

groupItems.title: Key Not in Vehicle
groupItems.description: Indicator light means the key is not in the car.

groupItems.title: Hood/Bonnet Open
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the car hood is not closed properly.

groupItems.title: Hazard Lights On
groupItems.description: Indicator light means hazard lights are turned on.

groupItems.title: Fan
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the internal ventilation/fan is in operation.

groupItems.title: Door Ajar
groupItems.description: Indicator light turns on when one or more doors of the car are not shut properly.

groupItems.title: Direction/Signal Indicators
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that one of the turn signals (left or right) has been activated.

groupItems.title: Car on Ramp
groupItems.description: Indicator light means that the vehicle is on a ramp/jack system.
